Avdotya's Dilemma

Tension in the room, Dounia and Luzhin face off.  
Luzhin: “Your words offend me, Avdotya.”  
Dounia: “I value my life more than your pride!”  

---  

Raskolnikov smirks, Razumihin looks nervous.  
Luzhin: “Love for your husband should outweigh your brother!”  
Dounia: “You misunderstand my loyalty and love!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Luzhin expresses his irritation and offense at Dounia's perceived disrespect towards him and his position in their relationship.
